title: My happiest years

description: Episode number 1 of Series "Unknown Chaplin". The first of a trilogy throwing new light on Chaplin's career in films. This part covers the period in which he made twelve 2 reel comedies. Using footage selected from previously uncut rushes, the progression of Chaplin's ideas is uncovered and insight is given into his working methods. Narrated by James Mason. Rated: G
